channel.title: How do i put my server out to the public?
channel.description: I want to make my server downloadable so others can play it but I dont know how to do it. And i know they arent supposed to play off of the one with my source.. Please help im so confused ):

item.title: How do i put my server out to the public?
item.dc:creator: @skiie skiie
item.description:
@skiie wrote:

jar and sign you client with jarmaker upload it to some uploady site example: uppit.com
and done you will need to have a portforwarded router and be hosting your server with no-ip or have a vps or what ever

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put my server out to the public?
